a.title: High School End of Course Testing Information
a.span: High School End of Course Testing Information

li.a: High School End of Course Testing Information

p.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal;

br.p:
The past couple of days, Mr. Sheridan and I have been calling the high school students to resolve their connection issues. Unfortunately their has not been a '1 Fix for All'. Many students are now connected but I know many of you are not.
I feel that the most efficient way for us to handle the remaining concerns is to be able to work on the devices directly.
I am asking that if you are having issues connecting to websites, please write down your login and password information on a piece of paper and place it in your laptop.
Next please bring your laptop to the school using the car rider line.
I will be available in the car rider line Friday evening from 4PM-6PM.
I will also be available in the car rider line Saturday morning from 9AM-11AM.
We will work on fixing the issue and schedule a return time as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience during this time.

div.p: Updates and information regarding district and instructional planning during this time of school closure can be found using the COVID-19 link in the main menu bar above or by clicking here.
